description: Observability for the ra-mcp MCP server. Metrics via OpenTelemetry OTLP → Prometheus. Counter panels use increase() so Y-axis shows actual counts per time bucket.

panels.description: Is the /health endpoint reachable? 1 = Up, 0 = Down. Powered by Grafana Synthetic Monitoring or Prometheus Blackbox Exporter.
panels.title: Health Probe

panels.description: HTTP status code returned by the /health endpoint.
panels.title: HTTP Status

panels.description: Server uptime indicator. Shows 'Up' when the build_info gauge is reporting. Confirms the server is alive and exporting metrics.
panels.title: Server Status

panels.description: SSL certificate expiry for the health endpoint. Yellow < 30 days, red < 7 days.
panels.title: SSL Cert Expiry

panels.description: Total time to complete the health probe (DNS + connect + TLS + transfer).
panels.title: Probe Duration

panels.description: Health probe success over time. 1 = reachable, 0 = unreachable. Gaps or dips indicate downtime.
panels.title: Health Probe History (RA-MCP)

panels.description: Health probe response time over time. Shows how quickly the /health endpoint responds to external probes.
panels.title: Probe Response Time

panels.description: Total search requests in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Searches

panels.description: Total browse requests in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Browses

panels.description: Ratio of browse requests to search requests. Higher values suggest users are finding and exploring results.
panels.title: Search → Browse

panels.description: Percentage of searches that returned zero results. High values may indicate search quality issues or unsupported query patterns.
panels.title: Zero-Result Rate

panels.description: Average number of results returned per search request.
panels.title: Avg Results/Search

panels.description: Number of browse requests where pages had no transcribed content.
panels.title: Empty Pages

panels.description: Search request rate over time, broken down by search type (transcribed vs metadata).
panels.title: Search Activity Over Time

panels.description: Browse request rate over time, broken down by status (success vs error).
panels.title: Browse Activity Over Time

panels.description: Recent search operations from Tempo traces. Shows the keyword searched, number of results found, and request duration.
panels.title: Recent Searches

panels.description: Searches that returned zero results. These may indicate unsupported query patterns, spelling issues, or gaps in the archive data.
panels.title: Zero-Result Searches

panels.description: Recent document browse operations from Tempo traces. Shows the reference code browsed and pages requested.
panels.title: Recently Browsed Documents

panels.description: MCP tool invocations for search and browse. Filters out internal noise (dedup, formatting) to show only user-facing operations with keywords and reference codes.
panels.title: Tool Invocations

list.description: Prometheus datasource containing Synthetic Monitoring / Blackbox Exporter probe_* metrics. In Grafana Cloud this is your grafanacloud-<stack>-prom datasource.
list.label: SM Datasource
list.name: sm_datasource

list.description: Select the Synthetic Monitoring check job that probes your health endpoint.
list.label: Health Check Job
list.name: health_job

title: ra-mcp — Riksarkivet MCP Server
